item.title: Changing Docs
item.description: Self-Hosted Docs The self-hosted documentation served by the apiserver is generated using Hugo. It constists of 2 parts: Hugo Theme in contrib/kubernikus-docs-builder/data Markdown docs in docs A live preview for development can be started with: docker run --rm -ti -p 1313:1313 \ -v $PWD/contrib/kubernikus-docs-builder/data:/live \ -v $PWD/docs/:/live/content \ --workdir /live \ sapcc/kubernikus-docs:latest \ hugo server \ --bind 0.0.0.0 \ --baseURL "http://localhost:1313/docs" \ --debug The docs are then accessible locally on http://localhost:1313
